info.description: Webex enables continuous teamwork with video meetings, group messaging, file sharing, and white boarding. Always available. Cisco secure. With the Webex connector, you can send and receive messages, manage files, and manage spaces and teams.
info.title: Webex

post.description: Add a member to an existing space

personId.description: Person ID of the new member
personId.title: Person ID

get.description: Get a list of recent messages for a space

parameters.description: List messages in a space for a given space ID
parameters.name: roomId

parameters.description: List messages where the caller is mentioned by specifying "me" or the caller personId.
parameters.name: mentionedPeople

parameters.description: List messages sent before a message, by ID.
parameters.name: beforeMessage

parameters.description: List messages sent before a date and time, in ISO8601 format.
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: Limit the maximum number of messages in the response.
parameters.name: max

text.description: Message Text, in plain text, used for clients that do not support markdown
text.title: text

toPersonEmail.description: The email address of the recipient when sending a private 1:1 message
toPersonEmail.title: Email

toPersonId.description: The ID of the recipient when sending a 1:1 message
toPersonId.title: Person ID

get.description: Shows details for a message, by message ID.
Lookup details and presence information for people in your organization

parameters.description: List people by ID. Accepts up to 85 person IDs separated by commas.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: List people with this email address
parameters.name: email

get.description: This action retrieves a list of spaces

parameters.description: Maximum number of spaces to return
parameters.name: max

parameters.description: (group) only include group spaces, (direct) only include 1 to 1 spaces, returns all if not specified
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: (id) the space id, (lastactivity) the last activity timestamp, (created) space creation date
parameters.name: sortBy

get.description: Return details of a given space

post.description: Add a member to a team

personId.description: Person ID of the new member
personId.title: Person ID

get.description: Get a list of teams you belong to

parameters.description: Max number of teams to return
parameters.name: max

post.description: Someone's membership was updated in a room that you're in; primarily used to detect moderator changes
Someone left or was kicked out of a room that you're in, or you left or were removed from a room; only triggers for group rooms, not 1-to-1 rooms
Someone joined a room that you're in or you've been added to a new room
New message posted into a room that you're in
A message was deleted from a room that you're in
A new space was created by you or one of your integrations
A space that you're in was updated; primarily used to detect when a space becomes Locked or Unlocked
